DOC.brief_summary: Preeclampsia ( PE ) intrauterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) clinical manifestation placental insufficiency . These complication affect 5-15 % pregnancy , responsible 20 % preterm birth . Women develop PE pregnancy also increase risk cardiovascular event , short long term . This justifies need improve diagnostic tool identify patient risk complication . PE IUGR multifactorial entity . Screening algorithms thus include several parameter achieve high detection rate . Research mainly focus analysis biophysical biochemical parameter , study placenta include current diagnostic strategy . Investigators hypothesize detection rate preeclampsia intrauterine growth restriction could improve study placental characteristic first trim pregnancy .
